name: random inspiration thingy
description:
click the "new" button to generate random silly game idea prompts!

probably completely useless for actually generating good game ideas, but could be fun to mess around with, I hope

all the words in the list it pulls from are SFW, but since it randomly mashes words together without understanding them, it might generate some results that might sound a bit lewd or slightly inappropriate, sorry. so be aware of that!

thank you~
